tasks.title: Create test suite for GET /api/todos/:id endpoint
tasks.description:
Create a comprehensive test file for the existing GET /api/todos/:id endpoint in backend/src/index.js (lines 53-70).

**Context:**
The GET /api/todos/:id endpoint is already implemented and functional. It fetches a single todo by ID and returns 404 if not found.

**Implementation Requirements:**
1. Create backend/src/get-todo-by-id.test.js following the pattern from backend/src/todos.test.js and backend/src/post-todos.test.js
2. Import db from './db.js' and { strict as assert } from 'assert'
3. Write comprehensive test cases covering:
   - Test 1: GET /api/todos/:id with valid ID returns the correct todo object
   - Test 2: GET /api/todos/:id with non-existent ID should simulate 404 behavior
   - Test 3: Verify returned todo has all required fields (id, title, description, completed, created_at, updated_at)
   - Test 4: Verify returned todo field types are correct
   - Test 5: Test with numeric ID parameter
   - Test 6: Clean up test data after tests complete
4. Follow the existing test pattern: create test todos using db.prepare(), run assertions, clean up with DELETE
5. Use console.log for test output with ✓ and ✅ symbols
6. Handle errors with try/catch and cleanup on failure
7. Structure: function testGetTodoByIdEndpoint() wrapped in try/catch, cleanup in finally block
acceptance_criteria: All test cases pass when run with node backend/src/get-todo-by-id.test.js
Tests verify correct todo is returned for valid ID
Tests verify 404 behavior for non-existent ID
Tests verify all required fields in returned todo object
Test data is properly cleaned up after execution

tasks.title: Validate GET /api/todos/:id endpoint tests
tasks.description:
Run the test suite for the GET /api/todos/:id endpoint to validate the implementation.

**Validation Steps:**
1. Run: node backend/src/get-todo-by-id.test.js
2. Verify all test cases pass:
   - GET /api/todos/:id with valid ID returns correct todo
   - GET /api/todos/:id with non-existent ID simulates 404
   - Returned todo has all required fields
   - Test data cleanup works correctly
3. Confirm output shows ✅ All tests passed
4. Verify no error messages in output
acceptance_criteria: Test data is cleaned up properly
